text: with two swim-in wave pools , arcade games littering public spaces and free gourmet food on offer , it is n't hard to see why a job at google is so sought after . the internet giant allegedly receives a resume every 25 seconds from eager job-seekers , and is expected to be deluged with 40,000-plus candidates wanting an internship . and it is little wonder , considering the perks on offer to successful applicants . scroll down for video . among the many perks at google are two swim-in-place wave pools . assorted video games , all free , are available anytime for employees needing a break in mountain view , california . for workers spending long hours in front of computers , or to just work out the kinks , there are massage rooms with professional masseuses available . the internet giant allegedly receives a cv every 25 seconds from eager job-seekers , and is expected to be deluged with 40,000-plus candidates wanting an internship . bike racks are everywhere , and electric cars and motorized scooters join peddlers in transport options at google hq . as these candid snaps -
